programme.title: Tchi Tcha
Tchi-tcha
programme.desc: Magazine cinéma au coeur de l'actualité culturelle, TCHI TCHA traite tous les genres cinématographiques, des plus pointus aux plus populaires, des blockbusters aux découvertes. En quinze minutes chrono, Laurie Cholewa ouvre un espace de culture et de divertissement et partage ses coups de coeur de la semaine, avec humour et bonne humeur.
programme.category: Magazine Cinéma

programme.title: Africa Mia
Africa Mia, la fabuleuse histoire des Maravillas de Mali
Africa Mia
programme.desc: Africa Mia: Directed by Richard Minier, Edouard Salier. 1964. In the midst of the Cold War, ten young promising musicians from Mali are sent to Cuba to study music and strengthen cultural links between the two socialist regimes. They invent a whole new genre: Afro- Cuban Music and become the iconic group 'Las Maravillas de Mali'. New Year's Eve 2000. Richard Minier, a French music producer meets a former member of the band in Bamako and decides to bring the band back together." data-id="main"/><metacontent="
programme.category: Documentary, Music, Documentary, Music

programme.title: Clique
programme.desc: Après avoir défriché le monde des cultures et des idées et offert une expérience nouvelle et puissante sur le digital, Clique Infos décide de s'attaquer à l'actualité chaude. Chaque dimanche un véritable magazine d'information estampillé Clique Infos reviendra pendant 52 minutes sur les temps forts de la semaine. Entouré de ses reporters qui viendront présenter leurs sujets, Mouloud Achour recevra ses invités au sein de la rédaction de Clique Infos. Bienveillance, pédagogie, impertinence et différence sont les mots d'ordre.

programme.title: Clique
programme.desc: Après avoir défriché le monde des cultures et des idées et offert une expérience nouvelle et puissante sur le digital, Clique Infos décide de s'attaquer à l'actualité chaude. Chaque dimanche un véritable magazine d'information estampillé Clique Infos reviendra pendant 52 minutes sur les temps forts de la semaine. Entouré de ses reporters qui viendront présenter leurs sujets, Mouloud Achour recevra ses invités au sein de la rédaction de Clique Infos. Bienveillance, pédagogie, impertinence et différence sont les mots d'ordre.
programme.category: Journal

programme.desc: Magazine cinéma au coeur de l'actualité culturelle, TCHI TCHA traite tous les genres cinématographiques, des plus pointus aux plus populaires, des blockbusters aux découvertes. programme.title: À l'origine
À l'origine
A l'origine
programme.desc: À l'origine: Directed by Xavier Giannoli. With François Cluzet, Emmanuelle Devos, Gérard Depardieu, Soko. France, present day. A professional conman passes himself off as the boss of a construction site building a highway extension. He cons the whole region, hires dozens of workers and cynically enjoys the profits of his scam until he meets the lady mayor of a small village that the road will go through. She intrigues and unsettles him, before revealing to him a world he never knew: feelings. How far will he go now to save his victims and save himself from his own lies?" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Tchi Tcha
Tchi-tcha
programme.desc: Magazine cinéma au coeur de l'actualité culturelle, TCHI TCHA traite tous les genres cinématographiques, des plus pointus aux plus populaires, des blockbusters aux découvertes. En quinze minutes chrono, Laurie Cholewa ouvre un espace de culture et de divertissement et partage ses coups de coeur de la semaine, avec humour et bonne humeur.

programme.desc: La vengeance d'une blonde: Directed by Jeannot Szwarc. With Christian Clavier, Marie-Anne Chazel, Clémentine Célarié, Thierry Lhermitte. An upstanding provincial reporter becomes presenter of the TV news on a commercial network owned by an influential Italian businessman. He soon outgrows his family and neglects them terribly. How to Make Out
programme.desc: T'as pécho?: Directed by Adeline Picault. With Paul Kircher, Inès d'Assomption, Ramzy Bedia, Vincent Macaigne. Arthur, 15, falls in love with Ouassima, who doesn't even look at him. While he has never been in love, she is dating Matt, the handsome kid from college. To get closer to her, Arthur gathers a group of single losers and offers to give them lessons in fishing, at 10 euros per lesson. programme.title: Marius
Marius
programme.desc: Marius: Directed by Daniel Auteuil. With Daniel Auteuil, Raphaël Personnaz, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Victoire Bélézy. "Marius" takes place in Marseilles' Old Port, at the La Marine Bar, owned by César and his son Marius. Marius' biggest dream is to embark on one of the boats passing by his dad's bar and to set off to a faraway land. Fanny, a young and pretty seafood peddler, has secretly been in love with Marius since her childhood; Marius, never admitting it, has always loved Fanny. One day, a sailor drops by La Marine and offers him a job on an exploratory ship. Trying to hold him off and to make him jealous, Fanny confesses his love to him and provokes a fight between Marius and one of César's old friends, Panisse, a boat merchant, who despite his old age, has been courting Fanny for a while. Torn between the call of the sea and his love for her, Marius abandons his dream to be with Fanny who gives herself to him. As César and Honorine, Fanny's mother, are getting ready for the wedding, Marius changes his mind, drawn back to the call of the sea. Sacrificing her love, Fanny convinces Marius to embark on his journey, leaving her behind. Devastated but holding back her tears, she hides Marius' decision to his father." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

credits.actor: Raphaël Personnaz / Marius, Daniel Auteuil / César, Jean-Pierre Darroussin / Panisse, Victoire Bélézy / Fanny, Marie-Anne Chazel / Honorine, Nicolas Vaude / monsieur Brun

programme.title: Detectiveland
programme.desc: Que l'on soit amateur de cinéma tendance Nouvelle Vague ou plutôt fan de STAR WARS, que l'on préfère Tarkovski ou Jean-Marie Poiré, le bon polar avec détective met immanquablement tout le monde d'accord ; ce genre, les Anglais l'appellent le «whodunit» («qui a fait le coup»), et les Américains, le «murder mystery». Directement inspiré des écrits de Conan Doyle, de Dorothy Sayers ou bien sûr d'Agatha Christie, le «whodunit» est un genre aussi vieux que le cinéma, mais toujours aussi populaire.
programme.category: Documentaire Cinéma

programme.title: Coursier
Coursier
programme.desc: Coursier: Directed by Hervé Renoh. With Michaël Youn, Géraldine Nakache, Jimmy Jean-Louis, Didier Flamand. From multicultural Paris to designer Paris, Montmartre to the Champs-Elysées, sleazy sidewalks to high-end galleries... Watch out! Sam the courier is a man on a mission! On his scooter, Sam breaks every rule of the road to make good on the "express delivery" promise of the courier service he works for. But however hard he tries, Sam never gets a bonus from his boss, never beats his slicker colleagues and never gets past his Dad, a cop who books him every time. All Sam has up is Nadia, and she will turn on him if he doesn't show up for her sister's wedding. Trouble is, Sam has one more delivery to make and his day has just gone from bad to worse..." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Tchi tcha
programme.desc: Aux commandes de ce magazine, Laurie Cholewa passe en revue l'actualité cinématographique, des films les plus pointus aux plus populaires, des blockbusters aux découvertes. Ce magazine consacré aux dernières sorties en salles revendique l'ouverture, l'humour et la bonne humeur... Au menu : des enquêtes, des interviews, des coups de coeur et les confidences d'une personnalité. «Tchi tcha» offre un espace de culture et de divertissement. Et parce que le cinéma est une affaire de coeur qui parle à chacun d'entre nous, une séquence nostalgie interpellera notre mémoire collective.
programme.category: Magazine Cinéma

programme.title: Les Lyonnais
Les Lyonnais
programme.desc: Les Lyonnais: Directed by Olivier Marchal. With Gérard Lanvin, Tchéky Karyo, Daniel Duval, Lionnel Astier. After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins. Most of all, he has remained friends with Serge Suttel, with whom he first discovered prison life - for stealing cherries. The two of them inevitably got involved in organized crime. The team they formed, the Gang Des Lyonnais, made them the most notorious armed robbers of the early 1970s. Their irresistible rise ended in 1974 with a spectacular arrest. Today, as he nears 60, Momon would like to forget that part of his life. He has found peace by retiring from the "business". He tends to his wife Janou, who suffered so in the past, and to his children and grandchildren, all of whom have great respect for this man of simple and universal values, so clear-headed and full of kindness. But then Serge Suttel, who has disowned nothing of his past, comes back into the picture." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

credits.actor: Gérard Lanvin / Momon Vidal, Tchéky Karyo / Serge Suttel, Daniel Duval / Christo, Dimitri Storoge / Momon Vidal jeune, Patrick Catalifo / Max Brauner, François Levantal / Joan Chavez

programme.title: Le dernier tournant
Le dernier tournant
programme.desc: Le dernier tournant: Directed by Pierre Chenal. With Fernand Gravey, Michel Simon, Marcel Vallée, Auguste Bovério. Frank, a hobo, ends up in a garage-truck stop in the middle of nowhere. Nick Marino, its older, kind and naive owner, is married to Cora, a sexy and mercenary woman half his age. Frank, although not a fan of hard work, accepts Nick's offer to work for him. Of course, it is not for Nick's sake that the young man becomes his attendant, but for the love of Cora under whose spell he has fallen at once. It does not take long before Cora, who despises her husband, asks her lover to help her get rid of him. Frank is reluctant at first but." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Yoyo
Yoyo
programme.desc: Yoyo: Directed by Pierre Étaix. With Pierre Étaix, Claudine Auger, Philippe Dionnet, Luce Klein. A man has everything: dozens of servants, a palace, vast woods, gardens, a lake, mechanical toys, private entertainment troupes of musicians and dancers. He has it all - but love. When alone, he sits at a desk, sighing, and looking at a photograph of a pretty girl. One day, the circus descended onto his palace, and amidst all the fun it brought, he recognized the Amazon on the white horse - the girl in the photograph. The girl is now the mother of a small boy, Yo-Yo, whom she considers that looks like the millionaire, even under a clown's make-up. The boy will spend some time in the palace, in awe of so much riches, but he will leave (in a dream-like scene) on the tusks of the elephant. Time passes - and one day Yo-Yo will be the owner of his father's palace in decay. Starting from scratch, he will rebuilt it, and be praised as a great clown, an artist, a film-maker, a millionaire. Yet, something is amiss..." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

credits.actor: Pierre Étaix / Yoyo, Claudine Auger / Isolina, Luce Klein / La cavalière, Philippe Dionnet / Yoyo enfant, Martine De Breteuil / Madame de Briac, Mimile / Clown

programme.title: L'école buissonnière
L'école buissonnière
programme.desc: L'école buissonnière: Directed by Jean-Paul Le Chanois. With Bernard Blier, Juliette Faber, Édouard Delmont, Edmond Ardisson. Soon after the Great War, the Provence village of Salezes gets a new boys' teacher: Mr. Pascal, a war hero with a diploma from a teachers' college. He rejects old methods: boys' sitting still with arms folded memorizing facts. He uses modern methods: he becomes their guide. The boys build a water-powered electric generator, interview their parents about shoe-making and cooking, draw, write poetry, and, after Pascal brings a box of type, put their own magazine together, printed on the backs of old ballots. Their new interest in critical thinking stirs opposition from the mayor and others. The teacher offers a deal: if even one student fails the national exam, he'll resign. All eyes are on Albert, an older youth who has failed three times." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Bernard Blier, façon puzzle
Bernard Blier façon puzzle
Bernard blier, façon puzzle
programme.desc: Bernard Blier, façon puzzle: Directed by Christophe Duchiron. With Bernard Blier. In a career spanning more than half a century, Bernard Blier has shot more than 180 films. He alone represents a history of French cinema without having spent his time cultivating its legend. He crossed his century as an actor with the modesty of a craftsman. He believed in learning, know-how and transmission. He considered himself, like the butcher or the cabinetmaker, as a man useful to his fellow men. Bernard Blier found in Louis Jouvet, who was his teacher at the Conservatory, a master at playing, a mentor and even a spiritual father. Jouvet taught Blier the love of acting, theater and Molière. And if he knew how to take hold of Michel Audiard's best tirades like no one else, notably those of the "Tontons Flingueurs", it is to this apprenticeship that he owes it." data-id="main"/><metacontent="
programme.category: Documentary, Documentary
programme.review: --- Actors: Bernard Blier (role=Self)

programme.title: Il gatto
Qui a tué le chat ?
Il gatto
programme.desc: Il gatto: Directed by Luigi Comencini. With Ugo Tognazzi, Mariangela Melato, Michel Galabru, Dalila Di Lazzaro. Amedeo and Ofelia, middle aged brother and sister, own jointly an old decadent, but still attractive, condominium. They want to sell it, but before they have to evict all the tenants. Of course, these don't want to leave at all. The cat (Il Gatto), mascot and beloved by all, dies and this gives the two an excuse to enter the tenants' life. Amedeo starts to court the young Wanda and Ofelia seduces the priest Don Pezzolla. In the meantime police is looking for the cat killer..." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Hava, Maryam, Ayesha
Hava, Maryam, Ayesha
programme.desc: Hava, Maryam, Ayesha: Directed by Sahraa Karimi. With Arezoo Ariapoor, Fereshta Afshar, Hasiba Ebrahimi, Zubaida Ahmadi. Three Afghan women from different social background, living in Kabul, are facing a big challenge in their lives. Hava, a traditional pregnant woman whom no one cares about, is living with her father and mother in law. Her only joy is talking to the baby in her belly. Maryam, an educated TV news reporter, is about to get a divorce from her unfaithful husband, but finds out she is pregnant. Ayesha, an 18-year old girl accepts to marry her cousin because she is pregnant from her boyfriend who disappears after hearing the news. Each of them has to solve her problem by herself for the first time." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Fort Saganne
Fort Saganne
programme.desc: Fort Saganne: Directed by Alain Corneau. With Gérard Depardieu, Philippe Noiret, Catherine Deneuve, Sophie Marceau. French civilization in the desert. Saganne is of peasant stock, with courage and a forceful will. In 1911, he volunteers and is posted to the Sahara under the aristocratic Colonel Dubreuilh. He catches the eye of Madeline, the daughter of the regional administrator. In the desert, Saganne is a leader, with the respect of Arabs, including Amajan, an independent warrior. After resourceful campaigns, Saganne goes on a diplomatic mission to Paris, where he has an affair with a journalist. Back in Africa, he leads a gallant defense against Sultan Omar, is awarded the Grand Cross of the Legion of Honour, and marries Madeline. Then the Great War puts at risk his success and happiness." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Felix in Wonderland
Felix in Wonderland
programme.desc: Felix in Wonderland: Directed by Marie Losier. With Felix Kubin, Claire Doyon. Fall into the world of Felix Kubin's experimentation and creation of music sound and his mastering of his instrument of predilection, the KORG MS20. A portrait of a great artist who never stops living with music in his head. With Felix creative power and endless inspiration, the film brings you into the universe of pure Music, from electronic music, to radio play, pop, music concrete, opera, and microphone experiments.... Felix is the little Nemo of a new sleepless world of music and pure joy!" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Playing Men
Playing Men
programme.desc: Playing Men: Directed by Matjaz Ivanisin. A documentary essay about the relationships among Mediterranean men and their games. The film takes the form of a travelogue across Croatia, Italy, Slovenia and Turkey, and examines men, young and old, who come together like their ancestors did - to play games. During filming, however, the director suddenly faces a serious creative crisis and turns the camera on himself, turning the film into a playful homage to absurdity." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Barnie et ses petites contrariétés
Barnie et ses petites contrariétés
programme.desc: Barnie et ses petites contrariétés: Directed by Bruno Chiche. With Fabrice Luchini, Nathalie Baye, Marie Gillain, Hugo Speer. Barnie lives in Calais but works in London. Every day, he takes the Eurostar to go to his office. Although he is married to Lucie, Barnie has two lovers in London: Margot, a young and fresh advertising executive, and Mark, a hot 35 year old auctioneer. Everything could work out fine like that, until Margot, Mark and Lucie separately offer Barnie the same birthday present: a return ticket to Venice on the Orient-Express, and on the same dates. What will Barnie do? Who will he choose to go with? After thinking that going with Lucie could actually save his marriage, problems are not over: Margot and Mark both show up at Barnie and Lucie's house, pretending to be a couple, and asking Barnie for some explanations. Which he obviously can't give." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

La petite voleuse
programme.desc: La petite voleuse: Directed by Claude Miller. With Charlotte Gainsbourg, Didier Bezace, Simon de La Brosse, Clotilde de Bayser. In a small town in post-World-War-II France, an unhappy sixteen-year-old (Janine Castang) tries to escape her dreary situation by any means at her disposal. programme.title: Hava, Maryam, Ayesha
Hava, Maryam, Ayesha
programme.desc: Hava, Maryam, Ayesha: Directed by Sahraa Karimi. With Arezoo Ariapoor, Fereshta Afshar, Hasiba Ebrahimi, Zubaida Ahmadi. Three Afghan women from different social background, living in Kabul, are facing a big challenge in their lives. Hava, a traditional pregnant woman whom no one cares about, is living with her father and mother in law. Her only joy is talking to the baby in her belly. Maryam, an educated TV news reporter, is about to get a divorce from her unfaithful husband, but finds out she is pregnant. Ayesha, an 18-year old girl accepts to marry her cousin because she is pregnant from her boyfriend who disappears after hearing the news. Each of them has to solve her problem by herself for the first time." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Je sais tomber
Je sais tomber
programme.desc: Je sais tomber: Directed by Alain Tasma. With Benjamin Voisin, Margot Bancilhon, Olivier Loustau, Aloïse Sauvage. Life is what it is in Picardie. 20-year-old Kévin has a 125cc bike and a part-time job on an industrial farm. Due to an accident, he is struck by Alice's smile--a smile leading to a dream and love. To be close to Alice who is an acrobatic horseback rider, he will learn to ride a horse. Changing one's life is possible. He believes it. To fall, rise up, again and again, nothing scares him, in work or elsewhere. But Alice isn't a dreamer. So a perilous equestrian and sentimental trial begins for Kévin. He will lose a couple feathers in the process but still have enough to take off." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 9070712, Title: Je sais tomber, --- Description: Je sais tomber: Directed by Alain Tasma. With Benjamin Voisin, Margot Bancilhon, Olivier Loustau, Aloïse Sauvage. Life is what it is in Picardie. 20-year-old Kévin has a 125cc bike and a part-time job on an industrial farm. Due to an accident, he is struck by Alice's smile--a smile leading to a dream and love. To be close to Alice who is an acrobatic horseback rider, he will learn to ride a horse. Changing one's life is possible. He believes it. To fall, rise up, again and again, nothing scares him, in work or elsewhere. But Alice isn't a dreamer. So a perilous equestrian and sentimental trial begins for Kévin. He will lose a couple feathers in the process but still have enough to take off." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Russkiy Reyd
Russian Raid
programme.desc: Russkiy Reyd: Directed by Denis Kryuchkov. With Ilya Antonenko, Vladimir Chuprikov, Nikita Kologrivyy, Ivan Kotik. Nikita, a former Russian Spetsnaz operative, is hired to neutralize the large private security force at a local factory so that his shady employer can extort the business from the factory owner. But Nikita and his group of highly trained fighters get more than they bargained for when it turns out the factory is actually owned by a dangerous warlord connected to the Russian military. By the time the 'hostile takeover' is complete, Nikita reveals that he has orchestrated his own secret mission to take personal revenge on the most dangerous man in Russia." data-id="main"/><metacontent="

Louise en hiver
programme.desc: Louise en hiver: Directed by Jean-François Laguionie. With Diane Dassigny, Piera Degli Esposti, Dominique Frot, Antony Hickling. In a wonderfully sweet yet poignant story, Louise, an old lady, finds herself stranded in a seaside resort after the last train of the holiday season has left the station. But far from panicking, the fearless Louise decides to stay, no matter what awaits her. And the worst does await her: foul weather, heavy rains, high tides. programme.title: La vie très privée de Monsieur Sim
La vie très privée de monsieur Sim
programme.desc: La vie très privée de Monsieur Sim: Directed by Michel Leclerc. With Jean-Pierre Bacri, Isabelle Gélinas, Vimala Pons, Christian Bouillette. François Sim considers himself worthless and he may have good reasons for that. Hasn't he lost his job as well as his wife Caroline? Isn't he unable to relate to Lucy, his teenage daughter? Didn't he, when he was eighteen miss out on passion whereas the sexy, gorgeous Luigia opened her arms to him? Hasn't he - he who keeps craving communication - invariably proved a dreadful bore to others...? So, when Sim is unexpectedly offered a job, he takes it, hoping one more time to give a little bit of meaning to his life. Even if his task amounts to driving across France and trying to sell... a "revolutionary biological toothbrush" to reluctant dentists!" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 4313614, Title: La vie très privée de Monsieur Sim, --- Description: La vie très privée de Monsieur Sim: Directed by Michel Leclerc. With Jean-Pierre Bacri, Isabelle Gélinas, Vimala Pons, Christian Bouillette. François Sim considers himself worthless and he may have good reasons for that. Hasn't he lost his job as well as his wife Caroline? Isn't he unable to relate to Lucy, his teenage daughter? Didn't he, when he was eighteen miss out on passion whereas the sexy, gorgeous Luigia opened her arms to him? Hasn't he - he who keeps craving communication - invariably proved a dreadful bore to others...? So, when Sim is unexpectedly offered a job, he takes it, hoping one more time to give a little bit of meaning to his life. Even if his task amounts to driving across France and trying to sell... a "revolutionary biological toothbrush" to reluctant dentists!" data-id="main"/><metacontent="

programme.title: Louise en hiver
Louise en hiver
programme.desc: Louise en hiver: Directed by Jean-François Laguionie. With Diane Dassigny, Piera Degli Esposti, Dominique Frot, Antony Hickling. In a wonderfully sweet yet poignant story, Louise, an old lady, finds herself stranded in a seaside resort after the last train of the holiday season has left the station. But far from panicking, the fearless Louise decides to stay, no matter what awaits her. And the worst does await her: foul weather, heavy rains, high tides. programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich ballert wieder: Diesmal fightet sie in L.A. gegen die blutgierigen Zombiehorden. Vierter Teil der erfolgreichen Sci-Fi-Horror-Saga um die coole Kampfamazone. – Das T-Virus hat beinahe alle Menschen in Zombies verwandelt. Die durch Gen-Experimente zur Superwaffe gewordene Alice (Milla Jovovich) ist immun, will aber Rache an der Entwicklungsfirma. Nachdem ihr in Tokio der Boss entwischt, rettet sie sich nach Alaska und findet eine alte Gefährtin. Sie fliegen nach L.A., wo sich in einem Knast ein paar Überlebende verstecken. Der Kampf gegen die anstürmenden Zombies beginnt.

programme.title: Matrix
programme.desc: Die Welt ist nur eine Simulation: Keanu Reeves und Laurence Fishburne kämpfen in ersten Teil der bombastischen Sci-Fi-Trilogie als coole Cyber-Rebellen gegen die Macht der Maschinen. Vier Oscars! – Die Welt ist nicht real, sondern nur eine Computersimulation namens "Matrix". Kontrollmaschinen halten die Menschen gefangen. Cyber-Punk Morpheus (Laurence Fishburne), der Anführer einer Untergrundbewegung, glaubt, dass allein der ahnungslose Computercrack Neo (Keanu Reeves) die Macht der Maschinen brechen kann.

programme.title: Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: Zion droht der Untergang! Im zweiten Teil der spektakulären Sci-Fi-Saga kämpfen Keanu Reeves und Laurence Fishburne um die letzte Zuflucht der Menschheit vor den Maschinen. – Die letzte Bastion der Menschen ist in Gefahr: Zion wird von der Maschinenarmee, die alles menschliche Leben vernichten will, belagert. Die Widerstandskämpfer Neo (Keanu Reeves), Trinity (Carrie-Anne Moss) und Morpheus (Laurence Fishburne) rüsten zum ultimativen Kampf gegen die Unterdrücker.

programme.title: Underworld – Evolution
programme.desc: Teil 2 des Blutsauger-Spektakels: Vollgas-Action mit Kate Beckinsale als bissfester Vampir-Amazone. – Nachdem die Blutsauger-Braut Selene (Kate Beckinsale) den Vampir-Ältesten getötet hat, wird sie von ihren Artgenossen wie Freiwild gejagt. Gemeinsam mit dem Mischwesen Michael (Scott Speedman) lebt sie permanent auf der Flucht. In ihrer Not bittet Selene den König der Vampire um Hilfe. Doch der verfolgt einen eigenen, teuflischen Plan. Er will sich mit seinem Werwolf-Bruder vereinen.

programme.title: Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier
Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier
programme.desc: Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier: Directed by Mike Marzuk. With Allegra Tinnefeld, Marinus Hohmann, Ron Antony Renzenbrink, Amelie Lammers. En route to a party they are not keen on attending, the Famous Five are almost relieved when Aunt Fanny's car breaks down, stranding them in a small town. To pass the time, they visit the local natural history museum, where some newly-discovered dinosaur bones are being unveiled. Here they meet Marty, who tells them that his father, long dead, supposedly found a complete dinosaur skeleton and made a map of its whereabouts. Unfortunately the map has been stolen. Unable to let a good mystery go unsolved, George, Julian, Dick, Anne and Timmy, join a guided hike through the Valley of Dinosaurs. But their fact-finding mission soon turns into a race to find the dinosaur when they suspect that the thief is one of the group." data-id="main"/><metacontent="
programme.category: Adventure, Family, Adventure, Family

programme.title: Lass es, Larry!
programme.desc: Loretta (Vivica A. Fox) wartet besorgt auf den Befund vom Arzt, ihr droht die Diagnose Krebs. Larry (Larry David) fühlt sich in der Beziehung mit ihr nicht mehr wohl und hält es für das Beste, sich von Loretta zu trennen, bevor sie eine finale Diagnose erhält. – Start der siebten Staffel der Improvisations-Comedy von und mit Larry David.

programme.title: American Housewife
programme.desc: Das Familienleben fordert seinen Tribut. Katie ist fix und fertig. Sie beschließt, sich zu schonen. Ehemann Greg verspricht seine Unterstützung, bekommt dann aber schnell einen klassischen Männerschnupfen.

programme.title: American Housewife
programme.desc: Katie muss sich nicht nur um die Kinder kümmern, sondern auch um Greg, der Grippe hat. Das zehrt an ihren Nerven. Es kommt zum Streit mit dem Schülerlotsen vor der Schule.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Glorias Exfreund Jorge kommt zu Besuch. Weil er sich mit Manny bestens versteht, vermutet Jay, dass er Mannys biologischer Vater sein könnte. Phil sucht das perfekte Hochzeitstagsgeschenk für Claire.

programme.title: Gott ist größer als Elvis
programme.desc: Dolores Hart war ein aufstrebendes Starlet in Hollywood. Sie hatte bereits in Filmen mit Elvis Presley, Montgomery Clift und Anthony Quinn mitgespielt. Doch 1963 entscheidet sie sich im Alter von 23 Jahren, den Benediktinerinnen beizutreten und ins Kloster zu gehen. Nun Priorin, wirft sie einen Blick zurück auf ihr bewegtes Leben. – Oscarnominierte, berührende und humorvolle Dokumentation eines ungewöhnlichen Lebens.

programme.desc: Ein Podcaster interviewt zwei Stars einer Horrorshow aus den 70ern. Sie erinnern sich an die Ursprünge ihres Kult-Programms und die Eifersüchteleien, die letztlich ihre Freundschaft zerstörten.

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Eine junge Frau verkauft ihre Seele für ein Leben voller irdischer Freuden. Jahrzehnte später muss sie sich der Abrechnung stellen.

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Finale der dritten Staffel: Eine Botanikerin legt auf der Suche nach einer seltenen Pflanze eine Ruhepause in Zimmer 104 ein – und erwacht in einem üppig wuchernden Dschungel.

programme.title: The Nevers

programme.title: The Nevers
programme.desc: Die ganze Stadt freut sich auf die bevorstehende Hinrichtung. Penance ringt mit einer moralischen Verpflichtung, die Amalias Plan entgegensteht. Dieser Konflikt droht die beiden zu trennen.

programme.title: Angels in America
programme.desc: Die Verfilmung des gleichnamigen Theaterstücks von Tony Kushner verwebt die Geschichten von acht Personen im Amerika der 80er-Jahre. Darunter der konservative Anwalt Roy Cohn (Al Pacino), die Mormonin Hannah (Meryl Streep) und dem an AIDS erkrankten Prior (Justin Kirk), der von einem Engel (Emma Thompson) Botschaften erhält. – Starbesetzte, mit elf Emmys und fünf Golden Globes augezeichnete Gesellschaftskritik. Regie führte Oscarpreisträger Mike Nichols ("Die Reifeprüfung").

programme.title: Euphoria

programme.title: Euphoria

programme.title: Euphoria

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: An Halloween sorgt sich Rue wegen ihrer Abhängigkeit von Jules, die sich immer beunruhigender verhält. McKay stellt seine Zukunft in Frage. Nate will sein Leben wieder in geordnete Bahnen lenken.

programme.title: Euphoria

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Start der vierten und letzten Staffel der Anthologie-Serie: Logan lädt den lange verschollen geglaubten Musiker Graham Husker (Serienschöpfer Mark Duplass) zu einem Privatkonzert in Hotelzimmer 104.

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Sam will sich den goldenen Schuss setzen. Da wird sie unerwartet mit der Geschichte ihrer Drogensucht konfrontiert. Sie bekommt die Chance aus ihren Fehlern zu lernen, bevor es zu spät ist.

programme.title: Room 104
programme.desc: Mit Hilfe von Therapie-Puppen versucht ein Ex-Wrestler (Dave Bautista) einen traumatischen Kampf zu verarbeiten. Dabei stößt er auch auf andere verdrängten Erinnerungen.

programme.title: FBI: Special Crime Unit
programme.desc: Maggie (Missy Peregrym) und Dana (Sela Ward) suchen Gerechtigkeit für die Opfer eines Serienmörders. Der Bürgermeister will die Untersuchung einschränken, um Kosten zu sparen.

programme.title: FBI: Special Crime Unit
programme.desc: OA (Zeeko Zaki) und Maggie (Missy Peregrym) arbeiten mit der Abteilung des FBI zusammen, die nach flüchtigen Verbrechern sucht, um eine Person zu finden, die wegen Mordes gesucht wird und die dann auf die Liste der zehn meistgesuchten Verbrecher gesetzt wird.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Ein Militärveteran mit posttraumatischer Belastungsstörung verliert nach dem Tod eines Kampfgefährten die Nerven. Der ehemalige Scharfschütze bringt die Fugitive Task Force an ihre Grenzen.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Ein Sektenführer gibt den Mord an seiner eigenen Familie in Auftrag und flieht mit seinen Vertrauten. Während der Verfolgung deckt das Team die Vergangenheit des selbsternannten Propheten auf.

programme.title: Navy CIS: L.A.
programme.desc: Der Prototyp einer Unterwasserdrohne wurde gestohlen. Das Team vermutet einen Video Gamer hinter der Tat. Callen und Sam stoßen bei den Ermittlungen auf eine alte Bekannte.

programme.title: Navy CIS: L.A.
programme.desc: Ein Leutnant der Navy verschwindet nach einem Autounfall. Das NCIS-Team stellt fest, dass auch sein Laptop fehlt – mit vertraulichen Informationen für pensionierte Navy SEALs.

programme.title: Navy CIS: L.A.
programme.desc: Beale wurde bei einer geheimen Mission entführt. Callen und Sam reisen nach San Francisco, um ihn zu suchen.

programme.title: Navy CIS: L.A.
programme.desc: Akhos Laos, ein ehemaliger von Hetty rekrutierter und ausgebildeter Agent, will sich an Hetty rächen für das Leben, in das sie ihn einführte.

programme.title: Navy CIS: L.A.
programme.desc: Der Diebstahl eines Computervirus und ein betrügerischer Banker beschäftigen das Team. Callen und Sam denken über ihre berufliche Zukunft nach, Kensi und Deeks über die Familienplanung.

programme.title: Navy CIS: L.A.
programme.desc: CIA Officer Veronica Stephens braucht die Hilfe des NCIS: Ein Agraringenieur, den sie im Auftrag Hettys in die USA bringen sollte, ist verschwunden.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Als in der San Francisco Bay Area ein junges Paar erschossen wird, beginnt die BAU mit den Ermittlungen: Es gibt Hinweise, dass der berüchtigte Zodiac-Killer erneut zugeschlagen hat. Dieser ist allerdings seit 1974 untergetaucht. Trotz der identischen Vorgehensweise bezweifelt das Team, dass der Zodiac-Mörder auch hier der Täter ist….

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Die BAU wird nach Atlantic City gerufen, wo ein Casinomanager ermordet wurde. Auf dem Leichnam ist die Spielkarte Acht drapiert und um ihn herum acht Geldscheine auf den Boden gelegt. Es scheint, als hätte der Mörder eine Art Ritual vollzogen. Doch als mögliche Täter kommen nahezu alle Spieler des Casinos in Frage, denn der Täter scheint spielsüchtig zu sein.

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Im Stargate-Center versammelt sich eine Delegation von Jonas' (Corin Nemec) Landsmännern, die um den Frieden auf ihrem Planeten fürchten. Drei feindliche Mächte kämpfen in Kelowna um die Herrschaft und der Streit droht zu eskalieren. Die Besucher gehören einer Untergrundorganisation, die unabhängig von den drei Gruppen fungiert. Den Wunsch nach Waffen zur Verteidigung lehnt das Pentagon strikt ab, doch SG-1 wird auf den Planeten geschickt, um die Hintergründe der Streitigkeiten zu erforschen und eine friedliche Lösung der Konflikts zu erwirken….
